headline: Micron Announces Participation in Investor Event
summary: BOISE, Idaho, July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Micron Technology, Inc. (Nasdaq: MU) announced today that company executives will participate at the KeyBanc Capital Markets Technology Leadership Forum in Deer Valley, Utah, on Monday, August 11, at 9:00 a.m. Mountain Time. Live webcasts and subsequent replays of presentations can be accessed from Micron’s Investor Relations website at investors.micron.com/. headline: Micron Unveils Portfolio of Industry-First SSDs to Power the AI Revolution
summary: News highlights: Complete new portfolio of industry-leading Micron G9 NAND data center SSDs is the first to utilize the industry’s 9th generation 3D NAND node.The 9650 SSD, the world's first PCIe® Gen6 data center SSD, delivers twice the performance of competitive drives.1The 6600 ION SSD, the world's first E3.S 122TB data center SSD with the industry’s 9th generation NAND, increases storage density up to 67%. headline: Nvidia-backed Enfabrica releases system aimed at easing memory costs
summary: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -Enfabrica, a Silicon Valley-based chip startup working on solving bottlenecks in artificial intelligence data centers, on Tuesday released a chip-and-software system aimed at reining in the cost of memory chips in those centers.  Enfabrica, which has raised $260 million in venture capital to date and is backed by Nvidia, released a system it calls EMFASYS, pronounced like "emphasis."  The system aims to address the fact that a portion of the high cost of flagship AI chips from Nvidia or rivals such as Advanced Micro Devices is not the computing chips themselves, but the expensive high-bandwidth memory (HBM) attached to them that is required to keep those speedy computing chips supplied with data.

headline: Micron Technology's Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: Micron Technology is expected to report a triple-digit surge in earnings for its upcoming fourth-quarter results.

headline: Tigermed Completes Acquisition of Japanese CRO Micron
summary: Tigermed (300347.SZ / 3347.HK), a leading global provider of clinical research solutions across the full lifecycle of global biopharmaceutical and medical device products, today announces the completion of its acquisition of CRO company Micron,Inc.
